name: @spruceid/opencred-dc-api
description: TypeScript/Node.js wrapper for OpenCred DC API WASM binary

scripts.build:dev: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:tag
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:tag
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:tag
scripts.release:tag: git tag npm/v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && echo 'Created tag npm/v'$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")'. Push with: git push origin npm/v'$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.prerelease: npm run clean && npm run build && npm pack --dry-run

author: SpruceID
